00008 #ifndef HAD_IS_H_

00010 
00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Hadronic initial state generator class using the LHAPDF weights,        *
00013  * combined with the parni adaptive grid to optimize x0,x1 generation with *
00014  * respect to some integrand.                                              *
00015  *                                                                         *
00016  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00017 
00018 #include <config.h>
00019 #include <Camorra/Minkowski.h>
00020 #include <Camgen/init_state.h>
00021 #include <Camgen/static_conf.h>
00022 #include <Camgen/rn_strm.h>
00023 #include <Camgen/parni_sub.h>
00024 #include <Camgen/power_law.h>
00025 #include <Camgen/inv_cosh.h>
00026 
00027 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00028 #include <LHAPDF/LHAPDF.h>
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 namespace Camorra
00032 {
00033     /* LHAPDF-weighted adaptive (anti-)proton-(anti-)proton initial state
00034     generator, parameterised by the momentum fractions carried by the
00035     initial partons. If the LHAPDF headers were not included, the hadron
00036     structure functions are set to unity.  */
00037 
00038     template<class model_t,class rng_t>class hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>: public initial_state<model_t,2>
00039     {
00040         typedef initial_state<model_t,2> base_type;
00041 
00042         public:
00043 
00044             /* Type definitions: */
00045 
00046             typedef model_t model_type;
00047             typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00048             typedef typename base_type::momentum_type momentum_type;
00049             typedef typename base_type::spacetime_type spacetime_type;
00050             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00051             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00052             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00053 
00054             /* Static integer constants: */
00055             
00056             static const size_type k0=spacetime_type::timelike_direction;
00057             static const size_type kL=(model_type::beam_direction<0)?(-model_type::beam_direction):(model_type::beam_direction);
00058 
00059             /* Public data members */
00060             /*---------------------*/
00061 
00062             /* First parton flavour: */
00063 
00064             const int hadron1;
00065 
00066             /* Second parton flavour: */
00067 
00068             const int hadron2;
00069 
00070             /* Public constructors */
00071             /*---------------------*/
00072 
00073             /* Constructor with anti-proton flags (true denotes pbar-beam): */
00074 
00075             hadronic_is_xx(bool q1,bool q2):base_type(true,true,true),hadron1(q1?(-2212):2212),hadron2(q2?(-2212):2212),flip(false)
00076             {
00077 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00078                 initialise_pdfs();
00079                 xmin.assign(LHAPDF::getXmin(pdf_number()));
00080                 xmax.assign(LHAPDF::getXmax(pdf_number()));
00081 #else
00082                 xmin.assign(0);
00083                 xmax.assign(1);
00084 #endif
00085                 xgen=new parni<value_type,2,rng_t>(&xvec,xmin,xmax,2*grid_bins(),grid_mode());
00086             }
00087 
00088             /* Copy constructor: */
00089             
00090             hadronic_is_xx(const hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t>& other):base_type(other),hadron1(other.hadron1),hadron2(other.hadron2),flip(false)
00091             {
00092 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00093                 initialise_pdfs();
00094                 xmin.assign(LHAPDF::getXmin(pdf_number()));
00095                 xmax.assign(LHAPDF::getXmax(pdf_number()));
00096 #else
00097                 xmin.assign(0);
00098                 xmax.assign(1);
00099 #endif
00100                 xgen=new parni<value_type,2,rng_t>(&xvec,xmin,xmax,2*grid_bins(),grid_mode());
00101             }
00102 
00103             /* Public destructors */
00104             /*--------------------*/
00105 
00106             /* Destructor: */
00107 
00108             ~hadronic_is_xx()
00109             {
00110                 delete xgen;
00111             }
00112 
00113             /* Public modifiers */
00114             /*------------------*/
00115 
00116             /* Hadronic invariant mass refresher (incoming hadrons are assumed
00117              * to be massless). */
00118 
00119             bool refresh_Ecm()
00120             {
00121                 value_type E1=this->beam_energy(0);
00122                 value_type E2=this->beam_energy(1);
00123                 return this->set_s((value_type)4*E1*E2);
00124             }
00125 
00126             /* Generation method implementation. */
00127             
00128             bool generate()
00129             {
00130                 if(!xgen->generate())
00131                 {
00132                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00133                     return false;
00134                 }
00135                 value_type P1=xvec[0]*this->beam_energy(0);
00136                 value_type P2=xvec[1]*this->beam_energy(1);
00137                 
00138                 flip=rn_stream::throw_coin();
00139                 size_type pa=flip?0:1;
00140                 size_type pb=flip?1:0;
00141                 
00142                 value_type Ehat1=std::sqrt(P1*P1+this->m2(pa));
00143                 value_type Ehat2=std::sqrt(P2*P2+this->m2(pb));
00144                 if(!this->set_s_hat(this->m2(0)+this->m2(1)+(value_type)2*(Ehat1*Ehat2+P1*P2)))
00145                 {
00146                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00147                     this->integrand()=(value_type)0;
00148                     return false;
00149                 }
00150 
00151                 this->p(pa).assign(0);
00152                 this->p(pa)[k0]=Ehat1;
00153                 this->p(pa)[kL]=P1;
00154 
00155                 this->p(pb).assign(0);
00156                 this->p(pb)[k0]=Ehat2;
00157                 this->p(pb)[kL]=-P2;
00158 
00159                 this->weight()=xgen->weight();
00160                 return true;
00161             }
00162 
00163             /* Weight evaluation implementation: */
00164             
00165             bool evaluate_weight()
00166             {
00167                 if(!xgen->evaluate_weight())
00168                 {
00169                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00170                     return false;
00171                 }
00172                 const momentum_type& p1=this->p(0);
00173                 const momentum_type& p2=this->p(1);
00174                 if(p1[0]<this->m(0) or p2[0]<this->m(1))
00175                 {
00176                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00177                     this->integrand()=(value_type)0;
00178                     return false;
00179                 }
00180                 value_type P1=std::abs(p1[kL]);
00181                 value_type P2=std::abs(p2[kL]);
00182                 if(!this->set_s_hat(this->m2(0)+this->m2(1)+(value_type)2*(p1[0]*p2[0]+P1*P2)))
00183                 {
00184                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00185                     this->integrand()=(value_type)0;
00186                     return false;
00187                 }
00188                 xvec[0]=P1/this->beam_energy(0);
00189                 xvec[1]=P2/this->beam_energy(1);
00190                 if(!xgen->evaluate_weight())
00191                 {
00192                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00193                     return false;
00194                 }
00195                 this->weight()=xgen->weight();
00196                 return true;
00197             }
00198 
00199             /* Flux factor output: */
00200 
00201             value_type flux_factor() const
00202             {
00203 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00204                 size_type pa=flip?0:1;
00205                 size_type pb=flip?1:0;
00206                 int n1=(this->parton_id(pa)==21)?0:((hadron1<0)?(-this->parton_id(pa)):(this->parton_id(pa)));
00207                 int n2=(this->parton_id(pb)==21)?0:((hadron2<0)?(-this->parton_id(pb)):(this->parton_id(pb)));
00208                 value_type xfx1=LHAPDF::xfx(xvec[0],this->mu_F,n1);
00209                 value_type xfx2=LHAPDF::xfx(xvec[1],this->mu_F,n2);
00210                 if(xfx1<(value_type)0 or xfx2<(value_type)0)
00211                 {
00212                     return (value_type)0;
00213                 }
00214                 else
00215                 {
00216                     value_type symm=(this->parton_id(0)==this->parton_id(1))?(value_type)0.5:(value_type)1;
00217                     return (symm*xfx1*xfx2)/(xvec[0]*xvec[1]*std::sqrt(Kallen(this->s_hat(),this->m2(0),this->m2(1))));
00218                 }
00219 #else
00220                 return (value_type)0.5/std::sqrt(Kallen(this->s_hat(),this->m2(0),this->m2(1)));
00221 #endif
00222             }
00223 
00224             /* Update method: */
00225 
00226             void update()
00227             {
00228                 xgen->integrand()=this->integrand()/xgen->weight();
00229                 xgen->update();
00230             }
00231             
00233 
00234             void adapt_grids()
00235             {
00236                 xgen->adapt();
00237             }
00238 
00239             /* Resets adaptive grids: */
00240 
00241             void reset()
00242             {
00243                 this->base_type::reset();
00244                 xgen->reset();
00245             }
00246 
00247             /* Public readout methods */
00248             /*------------------------*/
00249 
00250             /* Clone method implementation: */
00251 
00252             hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>* clone() const
00253             {
00254                 return new hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(*this);
00255             }
00256 
00257             /* Returns the coupling constant corresponding to the factorization
00258             scale: */
00259 
00260             value_type alpha_s() const
00261             {
00262 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00263                 return LHAPDF::alphasPDF(this->mu_F);
00264 #else
00265                 return value_type(-1);
00266 #endif
00267             }
00268 
00269             /* x-value redout: */
00270 
00271             const value_type& x(size_type i) const
00272             {
00273                 return xvec[i];
00274             }
00275 
00276             /* Lower bounds readout: */
00277 
00278             const value_type& x_min(size_type i) const
00279             {
00280                 return xmin[i];
00281             }
00282 
00283             /* Upper bound readout: */
00284 
00285             const value_type& x_max(size_type i) const
00286             {
00287                 return xmax[i];
00288             }
00289 
00290             /* Serialisation: */
00291             /*----------------*/
00292 
00293             /* Returns the polymorphic type. */
00294 
00295             std::string type() const
00296             {
00297                 switch(hadron1)
00298                 {
00299                     case 2212:
00300                         if(hadron2==2212)
00301                         {
00302                             return "pp_xx";
00303                         }
00304                         else if(hadron2==-2212)
00305                         {
00306                             return "ppbar_xx";
00307                         }
00308                         else
00309                         {
00310                             return "X";
00311                         }
00312                         break;
00313                     case -2212:
00314                         if(hadron2==2212)
00315                         {
00316                             return "pbarp_xx";
00317                         }
00318                         else if(hadron2==-2212)
00319                         {
00320                             return "pbarpbar_xx";
00321                         }
00322                         else
00323                         {
00324                             return "X";
00325                         }
00326                         break;
00327                     default:
00328                         return "X";
00329                 }
00330             }
00331 
00333 
00334             std::ostream& print_settings(std::ostream& os) const
00335             {
00336                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"beam energy -1:"<<this->beam_energy(0)<<std::endl;
00337                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"hadron -1:"<<hadron1<<std::endl;
00338                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"beam energy -2:"<<this->beam_energy(0)<<std::endl;
00339                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"hadron -2:"<<hadron2<<std::endl;
00340                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"Ecm:"<<this->Ecm()<<std::endl;
00341                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"PDF set:"<<pdf_name()<<std::endl;
00342                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"PDF nr:"<<pdf_number()<<std::endl;
00343                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"mu_F:"<<this->mu_F<<std::endl;
00344                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"alpha_s:"<<alpha_s()<<std::endl;
00345                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"mhatmin:"<<this->m_hat_min()<<std::endl;
00346                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"x1 interval:"<<"["<<xmin[0]<<','<<xmax[0]<<']'<<std::endl;
00347                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"x2 interval:"<<"["<<xmin[1]<<','<<xmax[1]<<']'<<std::endl;
00348                 return os;
00349             }
00350 
00351             /* Derived loading method: */
00352 
00353             std::istream& load_data(std::istream& is)
00354             {
00355                 safe_read(is,xmin[0]);
00356                 safe_read(is,xmin[1]);
00357                 safe_read(is,xmax[0]);
00358                 safe_read(is,xmax[1]);
00359                 if(xgen!=NULL)
00360                 {
00361                     delete xgen;
00362                 }
00363                 xgen=parni<value_type,2,rng_t>::create_instance(&xvec,is);
00364                 return is;
00365             }
00366 
00367             /* Derived saving method: */
00368 
00369             std::ostream& save_data(std::ostream& os) const
00370             {
00371                 safe_write(os,xmin[0]);
00372                 os<<"\t";
00373                 safe_write(os,xmin[1]);
00374                 os<<"\t\t";
00375                 safe_write(os,xmax[0]);
00376                 os<<"\t";
00377                 safe_write(os,xmax[1]);
00378                 os<<std::endl;
00379                 xgen->save(os);
00380                 return os;
00381             }
00382 
00383         private:
00384 
00385             /* x-values, minima and maxima: */
00386             
00387             vector<value_type,2>xvec,xmin,xmax;
00388             
00389             /* Adaptive grid generating x-values: */
00390             
00391             parni<value_type,2,rng_t>* xgen;
00392 
00393             /* Boolean denoting whether the initial state was swapped: */
00394 
00395             bool flip;
00396     };
00397     template<class model_t,class rng_t>const typename hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::size_type hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::k0;
00398     template<class model_t,class rng_t>const typename hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::size_type hadronic_is_xx<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::kL;
00399     
00400 
00401     /* LHAPDF-weighted adaptive (anti-)proton-(anti-)proton initial state
00402     generator, parameterized by the partonic invariant mass and the rapidity
00403     of the partonic system. If the LHAPDF-header was not included at
00404     configuration, the hadronic structure function are set to unity. */
00405 
00406     template<class model_t,class rng_t>class hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>: public initial_state<model_t,2>
00407     {
00408         /* Type definitions: */
00409 
00410         typedef initial_state<model_t,2> base_type;
00411 
00412         public:
00413 
00414             /* Type definitions: */
00415 
00416             typedef model_t model_type;
00417             typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00418             typedef typename base_type::momentum_type momentum_type;
00419             typedef typename base_type::spacetime_type spacetime_type;
00420             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00421             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00422             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00423 
00424             /* Static integer constants: */
00425             
00426             static const size_type k0=spacetime_type::timelike_direction;
00427             static const size_type kL=(model_type::beam_direction<0)?(-model_type::beam_direction):(model_type::beam_direction);
00428 
00429             /* Public data members */
00430             /*---------------------*/
00431 
00432             /* First parton flavour: */
00433 
00434             const int hadron1;
00435 
00436             /* Second beam hadron flavour: */
00437 
00438             const int hadron2;
00439 
00441             
00442             value_type nu_tau;
00443 
00444             /* Public constructors */
00445             /*---------------------*/
00446 
00447             /* Constructor with anti-proton flags (true denotes pbar-beam): */
00448 
00449             hadronic_is_sy(bool q1,bool q2):base_type(true,true,true),hadron1(q1?(-2212):2212),hadron2(q2?(-2212):2212),nu_tau(shat_exponent()),flip(false)
00450             {
00451 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00452                 initialise_pdfs();
00453                 LHA_ymax=(value_type)0.5*std::log(LHAPDF::getXmax(pdf_number())/LHAPDF::getXmin(pdf_number()));
00454 #else
00455                 LHA_ymax=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00456 #endif
00457                 ymax=LHA_ymax;
00458                 tau_gen=new adaptive_s_generator<value_type,rng_t>(&tau,new pl_s_generator<value_type,rng_t>(NULL,&nu_tau));
00459                 tau_gen->set_s_min_min(0);
00460                 tau_gen->set_s_min(0);
00461                 tau_gen->set_s_max_max(1);
00462                 tau_gen->set_s_max(1);
00463                 y_gen=new adaptive_s_generator<value_type,rng_t>(&y,new inv_cosh_y_generator<value_type,rng_t>);
00464                 if(ymax!=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity())
00465                 {
00466                     y_gen->set_s_min_min(-ymax);
00467                     y_gen->set_s_min(-ymax);
00468                     y_gen->set_s_max_max(ymax);
00469                     y_gen->set_s_max(ymax);
00470                 }
00471             }
00472 
00473             /* Copy constructor: */
00474             
00475             hadronic_is_sy(const hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t>& other):base_type(other),hadron1(other.hadron1),hadron2(other.hadron2),nu_tau(other.nu_tau),flip(false)
00476             {
00477 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00478                 initialise_pdfs();
00479                 LHA_ymax=(value_type)0.5*std::log(LHAPDF::getXmax(pdf_number())/LHAPDF::getXmin(pdf_number()));
00480 #else
00481                 LHA_ymax=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00482 #endif
00483                 ymax=LHA_ymax;
00484                 tau_gen=new adaptive_s_generator<value_type,rng_t>(&tau,new pl_s_generator<value_type,rng_t>(NULL,&nu_tau));
00485                 tau_gen->set_s_min_min(0);
00486                 tau_gen->set_s_min(0);
00487                 tau_gen->set_s_max_max(1);
00488                 tau_gen->set_s_max(1);
00489                 y_gen=new adaptive_s_generator<value_type,rng_t>(&y,new inv_cosh_y_generator<value_type,rng_t>);
00490                 if(LHA_ymax!=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity())
00491                 {
00492                     y_gen->set_s_min_min(-ymax);
00493                     y_gen->set_s_min(-ymax);
00494                     y_gen->set_s_max_max(ymax);
00495                     y_gen->set_s_max(ymax);
00496                 }
00497             }
00498 
00499             /* Public destructors */
00500             /*--------------------*/
00501 
00502             /* Destructor: */
00503 
00504             ~hadronic_is_sy()
00505             {
00506                 delete tau_gen;
00507                 delete y_gen;
00508             }
00509 
00510             /* Public modifiers */
00511             /*------------------*/
00512             
00513             /* Hadronic invariant mass refresher (incoming hadrons are assumed
00514              * to be massless). */
00515 
00516             bool refresh_Ecm()
00517             {
00518                 value_type E1=this->beam_energy(0);
00519                 value_type E2=this->beam_energy(1);
00520                 if(this->set_s((value_type)4*E1*E2))
00521                 {
00522                     tau_gen->set_s_min_min((this->s_hat_min()-this->m2(0)-this->m2(1))/this->s());
00523                     tau_gen->set_s_min((this->s_hat_min()-this->m2(0)-this->m2(1))/this->s());
00524                     ymax=std::min(-(value_type)0.5*std::log(tau_gen->s_min()),LHA_ymax);
00525                     y_gen->set_s_min_min(-ymax);
00526                     y_gen->set_s_min(-ymax);
00527                     y_gen->set_s_max_max(ymax);
00528                     y_gen->set_s_max(ymax);
00529                     return true;
00530                 }
00531                 return false;
00532             }
00533 
00534             /* Sets the minimal partonic invariant mass-squared to the argument. */
00535             
00536             bool set_s_hat_min(const value_type& s)
00537             {
00538                 if(this->base_type::set_s_hat_min(s))
00539                 {
00540                     tau_gen->set_s_min_min((this->s_hat_min()-this->m2(0)-this->m2(1))/this->s());
00541                     tau_gen->set_s_min((this->s_hat_min()-this->m2(0)-this->m2(1))/this->s());
00542                     ymax=std::min(-(value_type)0.5*std::log(tau_gen->s_min()),LHA_ymax);
00543                     y_gen->set_s_min_min(-ymax);
00544                     y_gen->set_s_min(-ymax);
00545                     y_gen->set_s_max_max(ymax);
00546                     y_gen->set_s_max(ymax);
00547                     return true;
00548                 }
00549                 return false;
00550             }
00551 
00552             /* Sets the minimal partonic invariant mass to the argument. */
00553             
00554             bool set_m_hat_min(const value_type& m)
00555             {
00556                 if(this->base_type::set_m_hat_min(m))
00557                 {
00558                     tau_gen->set_s_min_min((this->s_hat_min()-this->m2(0)-this->m2(1))/this->s());
00559                     tau_gen->set_s_min((this->s_hat_min()-this->m2(0)-this->m2(1))/this->s());
00560                     ymax=std::min(-(value_type)0.5*std::log(tau_gen->s_min()),LHA_ymax);
00561                     y_gen->set_s_min_min(-ymax);
00562                     y_gen->set_s_min(-ymax);
00563                     y_gen->set_s_max_max(ymax);
00564                     y_gen->set_s_max(ymax);
00565                     return true;
00566                 }
00567                 return false;
00568             }
00569 
00570             /* Generation method implementation. */
00571             
00572             bool generate()
00573             {
00574                 if(!tau_gen->generate())
00575                 {
00576                     LOG(warning)<<"tau generation failed within ["<<tau_gen->s_min()<<','<<tau_gen->s_max()<<']'<<ENDLOG(warning);
00577                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00578                     return false;
00579                 }
00580                 value_type ybound=std::max(ymax,-(value_type)0.5*std::log(tau));
00581                 y_gen->set_s_min(-ybound);
00582                 y_gen->set_s_max(ybound);
00583                 if(!y_gen->generate())
00584                 {
00585                     LOG(warning)<<"y generation failed within ["<<y_gen->s_min()<<','<<y_gen->s_max()<<']'<<ENDLOG(warning);
00586                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00587                     return false;
00588                 }
00589                 value_type sqrttau=std::sqrt(tau);
00590                 value_type expy=std::exp(y);
00591                 x1=sqrttau*expy;
00592                 x2=sqrttau/expy;
00593                 value_type P1=x1*this->beam_energy(0);
00594                 value_type P2=x2*this->beam_energy(1);
00595                 
00596                 flip=rn_stream::throw_coin();
00597                 size_type pa=flip?0:1;
00598                 size_type pb=flip?1:0;
00599                 
00600                 value_type Ehat1=std::sqrt(P1*P1+this->m2(pa));
00601                 value_type Ehat2=std::sqrt(P2*P2+this->m2(pb));
00602 
00603                 this->p(pa).assign(0);
00604                 this->p(pa)[k0]=Ehat1;
00605                 this->p(pa)[kL]=P1;
00606                 this->p(pb).assign(0);
00607                 this->p(pb)[k0]=Ehat2;
00608                 this->p(pb)[kL]=-P2;
00609 
00610                 if(!this->set_s_hat(this->m2(0)+this->m2(1)+(value_type)2*(Ehat1*Ehat2+P1*P2)))
00611                 {
00612                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00613                     this->integrand()=(value_type)0;
00614                     return false;
00615                 }
00616                 this->weight()=tau_gen->weight()*y_gen->weight();
00617                 return true;
00618             }
00619             
00620             /* Weight evaluation implementation: */
00621             
00622             bool evaluate_weight()
00623             {
00624                 const momentum_type& p1=this->p(0);
00625                 const momentum_type& p2=this->p(1);
00626                 if(p1[k0]<this->m(0) or p2[k0]<this->m(1))
00627                 {
00628                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00629                     this->integrand()=(value_type)0;
00630                     return false;
00631                 }
00632                 value_type P1=std::abs(p1[kL]);
00633                 value_type P2=std::abs(p2[kL]);
00634                 if(!this->set_s_hat(this->m2(0)+this->m2(1)+(value_type)2*(p1[k0]*p2[k0]+P1*P2)))
00635                 {
00636                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00637                     this->integrand()=(value_type)0;
00638                     return false;
00639                 }
00640                 x1=P1/this->beam_energy(0);
00641                 x2=P2/this->beam_energy(1);
00642                 tau=x1*x2;
00643                 if(!tau_gen->evaluate_weight())
00644                 {
00645                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00646                     this->integrand()=(value_type)0;
00647                     return false;
00648                 }
00649                 y=(value_type)0.5*std::log(x1/x2);
00650                 value_type ybound=std::max(ymax,-(value_type)0.5*std::log(tau));
00651                 y_gen->set_s_min(-ybound);
00652                 y_gen->set_s_max(ybound);
00653                 if(!y_gen->evaluate_weight())
00654                 {
00655                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00656                     this->integrand()=(value_type)0;
00657                     return false;
00658                 }
00659                 this->weight()=tau_gen->weight()*y_gen->weight();
00660                 return true;
00661             }
00662 
00663             /* Flux factor output: */
00664 
00665             value_type flux_factor() const
00666             {
00667 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00668                 size_type pa=flip?0:1;
00669                 size_type pb=flip?1:0;
00670                 int n1=(this->parton_id(pa)==21)?0:((hadron1<0)?(-this->parton_id(pa)):(this->parton_id(pa)));
00671                 int n2=(this->parton_id(pb)==21)?0:((hadron2<0)?(-this->parton_id(pb)):(this->parton_id(pb)));
00672                 value_type xfx1=LHAPDF::xfx(x1,this->mu_F,n1);
00673                 value_type xfx2=LHAPDF::xfx(x2,this->mu_F,n2);
00674                 if(xfx1<(value_type)0 or xfx2<(value_type)0)
00675                 {
00676                     return (value_type)0;
00677                 }
00678                 else
00679                 {
00680                     value_type symm=(this->parton_id(0)==this->parton_id(1))?(value_type)0.5:(value_type)1;
00681                     return (symm*xfx1*xfx2)/(tau*std::sqrt(Kallen(this->s_hat(),this->m2(0),this->m2(1))));
00682                 }
00683 #else
00684                 return (value_type)0.5/std::sqrt(Kallen(this->s_hat(),this->m2(0),this->m2(1)));
00685 #endif
00686             }
00687 
00688             /* Update method: */
00689 
00690             void update()
00691             {
00692                 tau_gen->integrand()=this->integrand();
00693                 tau_gen->update_weight();
00694                 y_gen->integrand()=this->integrand();
00695                 y_gen->update_weight();
00696             }
00697             
00698             /* Adaptor method implementation: */
00699 
00700             void adapt_grids()
00701             {
00702                 tau_gen->adapt();
00703                 y_gen->adapt();
00704             }
00705 
00706             /* Resets adaptive grids: */
00707 
00708             void reset()
00709             {
00710                 this->base_type::reset();
00711                 tau_gen->reset();
00712                 y_gen->reset();
00713             }
00714 
00715             /* Public readout methods */
00716             /*------------------------*/
00717 
00718             /* Clone method implementation: */
00719 
00720             hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>* clone() const
00721             {
00722                 return new hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(*this);
00723             }
00724 
00725             /* Returns the coupling constant corresponding to the factorization
00726             scale: */
00727 
00728             value_type alpha_s() const
00729             {
00730 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00731                 return LHAPDF::alphasPDF(this->mu_F);
00732 #else
00733                 return value_type(-1);
00734 #endif
00735             }
00736 
00737             /* Serialisation: */
00738             /*----------------*/
00739 
00740             /* Returns the polymorphic type. */
00741 
00742             std::string type() const
00743             {
00744                 switch(hadron1)
00745                 {
00746                     case 2212:
00747                         if(hadron2==2212)
00748                         {
00749                             return "pp_sy";
00750                         }
00751                         else if(hadron2==-2212)
00752                         {
00753                             return "ppbar_sy";
00754                         }
00755                         else
00756                         {
00757                             return "X";
00758                         }
00759                         break;
00760                     case -2212:
00761                         if(hadron2==2212)
00762                         {
00763                             return "pbarp_sy";
00764                         }
00765                         else if(hadron2==-2212)
00766                         {
00767                             return "pbarpbar_sy";
00768                         }
00769                         else
00770                         {
00771                             return "X";
00772                         }
00773                         break;
00774                     default:
00775                         return "X";
00776                 }
00777             }
00778 
00780 
00781             std::ostream& print_settings(std::ostream& os) const
00782             {
00783                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"beam energy -1:"<<this->beam_energy(0)<<std::endl;
00784                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"hadron -1:"<<hadron1<<std::endl;
00785                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"beam energy -2:"<<this->beam_energy(0)<<std::endl;
00786                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"hadron -2:"<<hadron2<<std::endl;
00787                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"Ecm:"<<this->Ecm()<<std::endl;
00788                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"PDF set:"<<pdf_name()<<std::endl;
00789                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"PDF nr:"<<pdf_number()<<std::endl;
00790                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"mu_F:"<<this->mu_F<<std::endl;
00791                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"alpha_s:"<<alpha_s()<<std::endl;
00792                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"mhatmin:"<<this->m_hat_min()<<std::endl;
00793                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"shat-sampling exp:"<<nu_tau<<std::endl;
00794                 return os;
00795             }
00796 
00797             /* Derived loading method: */
00798 
00799             std::istream& load_data(std::istream& is)
00800             {
00801                 safe_read(is,nu_tau);
00802                 safe_read(is,ymax);
00803                 safe_read(is,LHA_ymax);
00804                 if(tau_gen!=NULL)
00805                 {
00806                     delete tau_gen;
00807                 }
00808                 tau_gen=s_generator<value_type,rng_t>::create_instance(&tau,is,NULL,NULL,&nu_tau);
00809                 if(y_gen!=NULL)
00810                 {
00811                     delete y_gen;
00812                 }
00813                 y_gen=s_generator<value_type,rng_t>::create_instance(&y,is,NULL,NULL,NULL);
00814                 return is;
00815             }
00816 
00817             /* Derived saving method: */
00818 
00819             std::ostream& save_data(std::ostream& os) const
00820             {
00821                 safe_write(os,nu_tau);
00822                 os<<"\t";
00823                 safe_write(os,ymax);
00824                 os<<"\t";
00825                 safe_write(os,LHA_ymax);
00826                 os<<std::endl;
00827                 tau_gen->save(os);
00828                 y_gen->save(os);
00829                 return os;
00830             }
00831 
00832         private:
00833             
00834             value_type tau,y,x1,x2,ymax,LHA_ymax;
00835             s_generator<value_type,rng_t>* tau_gen;
00836             s_generator<value_type,rng_t>* y_gen;
00837             bool flip;
00838     };
00839     template<class model_t,class rng_t>const typename hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::size_type hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::k0;
00840     template<class model_t,class rng_t>const typename hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::size_type hadronic_is_sy<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::kL;
00841     
00842     /* LHAPDF-weighted adaptive (anti-)proton-(anti-)proton initial state
00843     generator, parameterized by the rapidity of the partonic system. The
00844     partonic invariant mass should be generated by the final state. */
00845     
00846     template<class model_t,class rng_t>class hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>: public initial_state<model_t,2>
00847     {
00848         /* Type definitions: */
00849 
00850         typedef initial_state<model_t,2> base_type;
00851 
00852         public:
00853 
00854             /* Type definitions: */
00855 
00856             typedef model_t model_type;
00857             typedef typename base_type::value_type value_type;
00858             typedef typename base_type::momentum_type momentum_type;
00859             typedef typename base_type::spacetime_type spacetime_type;
00860             typedef typename base_type::size_type size_type;
00861             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00862             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00863 
00864             /* Static integer constants: */
00865             
00866             static const size_type k0=spacetime_type::timelike_direction;
00867             static const size_type kL=(model_type::beam_direction<0)?(-model_type::beam_direction):(model_type::beam_direction);
00868 
00869             /* Public data members */
00870             /*---------------------*/
00871 
00872             /* First parton flavour: */
00873 
00874             const int hadron1;
00875 
00876             /* Second beam hadron flavour: */
00877 
00878             const int hadron2;
00879 
00880             /* Public constructors */
00881             /*---------------------*/
00882 
00883             /* Constructor with anti-proton flags (true denotes pbar-beam): */
00884 
00885             hadronic_is_y(bool q1,bool q2):base_type(true,true,false),hadron1(q1?(-2212):2212),hadron2(q2?(-2212):2212),flip(false)
00886             {
00887 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00888                 initialise_pdfs();
00889                 LHA_ymax=(value_type)0.5*std::log(LHAPDF::getXmax(pdf_number())/LHAPDF::getXmin(pdf_number()));
00890 #else
00891                 LHA_ymax=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00892 #endif
00893                 ymax=LHA_ymax;
00894                 y_gen=new adaptive_s_generator<value_type,rng_t>(&y,new inv_cosh_y_generator<value_type,rng_t>);
00895                 if(ymax!=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity())
00896                 {
00897                     y_gen->set_s_min_min(-ymax);
00898                     y_gen->set_s_min(-ymax);
00899                     y_gen->set_s_max_max(ymax);
00900                     y_gen->set_s_max(ymax);
00901                 }
00902             }
00903 
00904             /* Copy constructor: */
00905             
00906             hadronic_is_y(const hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t>& other):base_type(other),hadron1(other.hadron1),hadron2(other.hadron2),flip(false)
00907             {
00908 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
00909                 initialise_pdfs();
00910                 LHA_ymax=(value_type)0.5*std::log(LHAPDF::getXmax(pdf_number())/LHAPDF::getXmin(pdf_number()));
00911 #else
00912                 LHA_ymax=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity();
00913 #endif
00914                 ymax=LHA_ymax;
00915                 y_gen=new adaptive_s_generator<value_type,rng_t>(&y,new inv_cosh_y_generator<value_type,rng_t>);
00916                 if(LHA_ymax!=std::numeric_limits<value_type>::infinity())
00917                 {
00918                     y_gen->set_s_min_min(-ymax);
00919                     y_gen->set_s_min(-ymax);
00920                     y_gen->set_s_max_max(ymax);
00921                     y_gen->set_s_max(ymax);
00922                 }
00923             }
00924 
00925             /* Public destructors */
00926             /*--------------------*/
00927 
00928             /* Destructor: */
00929 
00930             ~hadronic_is_y()
00931             {
00932                 delete y_gen;
00933             }
00934 
00935             /* Public modifiers */
00936             /*------------------*/
00937             
00938             /* Hadronic invariant mass refresher (incoming hadrons are assumed
00939              * to be massless). */
00940 
00941             bool refresh_Ecm()
00942             {
00943                 value_type E1=this->beam_energy(0);
00944                 value_type E2=this->beam_energy(1);
00945                 if(this->set_s((value_type)4*E1*E2))
00946                 {
00947                     tau_min=(this->s_hat_min()-this->m2(0)-this->m2(1))/this->s();
00948                     ymax=std::min(-(value_type)0.5*std::log(tau_min),LHA_ymax);
00949                     y_gen->set_s_min_min(-ymax);
00950                     y_gen->set_s_min(-ymax);
00951                     y_gen->set_s_max_max(ymax);
00952                     y_gen->set_s_max(ymax);
00953                     return true;
00954                 }
00955                 return false;
00956             }
00957 
00958             /* Sets the minimal partonic invariant mass-squared to the argument. */
00959             
00960             bool set_s_hat_min(const value_type& s)
00961             {
00962                 if(this->base_type::set_s_hat_min(s))
00963                 {
00964                     tau_min=(this->s_hat_min()-this->m2(0)-this->m2(1))/this->s();
00965                     ymax=std::min(-(value_type)0.5*std::log(tau_min),LHA_ymax);
00966                     y_gen->set_s_min_min(-ymax);
00967                     y_gen->set_s_min(-ymax);
00968                     y_gen->set_s_max_max(ymax);
00969                     y_gen->set_s_max(ymax);
00970                     return true;
00971                 }
00972                 return false;
00973             }
00974 
00975             /* Sets the minimal partonic invariant mass to the argument. */
00976             
00977             bool set_m_hat_min(const value_type& m)
00978             {
00979                 if(this->base_type::set_m_hat_min(m))
00980                 {
00981                     tau_min=(this->s_hat_min()-this->m2(0)-this->m2(1))/this->s();
00982                     ymax=std::min(-(value_type)0.5*std::log(tau_min),LHA_ymax);
00983                     y_gen->set_s_min_min(-ymax);
00984                     y_gen->set_s_min(-ymax);
00985                     y_gen->set_s_max_max(ymax);
00986                     y_gen->set_s_max(ymax);
00987                     return true;
00988                 }
00989                 return false;
00990             }
00991 
00992             /* Generation method implementation. */
00993             
00994             bool generate()
00995             {
00996                 tau=this->s_hat()/this->s();
00997                 value_type ybound=std::max(ymax,-(value_type)0.5*std::log(tau));
00998                 y_gen->set_s_min(-ybound);
00999                 y_gen->set_s_max(ybound);
01000                 if(!y_gen->generate())
01001                 {
01002                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
01003                     return false;
01004                 }
01005                 value_type sqrttau=std::sqrt(tau);
01006                 value_type expy=std::exp(y);
01007                 x1=sqrttau*expy;
01008                 x2=sqrttau/expy;
01009                 value_type P1=x1*this->beam_energy(0);
01010                 value_type P2=x2*this->beam_energy(1);
01011                 
01012                 flip=rn_stream::throw_coin();
01013                 size_type pa=flip?0:1;
01014                 size_type pb=flip?1:0;
01015                 
01016                 value_type Ehat1=std::sqrt(P1*P1+this->m2(pa));
01017                 value_type Ehat2=std::sqrt(P2*P2+this->m2(pb));
01018 
01019                 this->p(pa).assign(0);
01020                 this->p(pa)[k0]=Ehat1;
01021                 this->p(pa)[kL]=P1;
01022                 this->p(pb).assign(0);
01023                 this->p(pb)[k0]=Ehat2;
01024                 this->p(pb)[kL]=-P2;
01025                 this->weight()=y_gen->weight();
01026 
01027                 return true;
01028             }
01029 
01030             /* Weight evaluation implementation: */
01031             
01032             bool evaluate_weight()
01033             {
01034                 const momentum_type& p1=this->p(0);
01035                 const momentum_type& p2=this->p(1);
01036                 if(p1[k0]<this->m(0) or p2[k0]<this->m(1))
01037                 {
01038                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
01039                     this->integrand()=(value_type)0;
01040                     return false;
01041                 }
01042                 value_type P1=std::abs(p1[kL]);
01043                 value_type P2=std::abs(p2[kL]);
01044                 x1=P1/this->beam_energy(0);
01045                 x2=P2/this->beam_energy(1);
01046                 tau=x1*x2;
01047 
01048                 value_type ybound=std::max(ymax,-(value_type)0.5*std::log(tau));
01049                 y_gen->set_s_min(-ybound);
01050                 y_gen->set_s_max(ybound);
01051                 y=(value_type)0.5*std::log(x1/x2);
01052                 if(!y_gen->evaluate_weight())
01053                 {
01054                     this->weight()=(value_type)0;
01055                     return false;
01056                 }
01057                 this->weight()=y_gen->weight();
01058                 return true;
01059             }
01060 
01061             /* Flux factor output: */
01062 
01063             value_type flux_factor() const
01064             {
01065 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
01066                 size_type pa=flip?0:1;
01067                 size_type pb=flip?1:0;
01068                 int n1=(this->parton_id(pa)==21)?0:((hadron1<0)?(-this->parton_id(pa)):(this->parton_id(pa)));
01069                 int n2=(this->parton_id(pb)==21)?0:((hadron2<0)?(-this->parton_id(pb)):(this->parton_id(pb)));
01070                 value_type xfx1=LHAPDF::xfx(x1,this->mu_F,n1);
01071                 value_type xfx2=LHAPDF::xfx(x2,this->mu_F,n2);
01072                 if(xfx1<(value_type)0 or xfx2<(value_type)0)
01073                 {
01074                     return (value_type)0;
01075                 }
01076                 else
01077                 {
01078                     value_type symm=(this->parton_id(0)==this->parton_id(1))?(value_type)0.5:(value_type)1;
01079                     return (symm*xfx1*xfx2)/((this->s_hat())*std::sqrt(Kallen(this->s_hat(),this->m2(0),this->m2(1))));
01080                 }
01081 #else
01082                 return (value_type)0.5/std::sqrt(Kallen(this->s_hat(),this->m2(0),this->m2(1)));
01083 #endif
01084             }
01085 
01086             /* Update method: */
01087 
01088             void update()
01089             {
01090                 y_gen->integrand()=this->integrand();
01091                 y_gen->update();
01092             }
01093             
01094             /* Adaptor method implementation: */
01095 
01096             void adapt_grids()
01097             {
01098                 y_gen->adapt();
01099             }
01100 
01101             /* Resets adaptive grids: */
01102 
01103             void reset()
01104             {
01105                 this->base_type::reset();
01106                 y_gen->reset();
01107             }
01108 
01109             /* Public readout methods */
01110             /*------------------------*/
01111 
01112             /* Clone method implementation: */
01113 
01114             hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>* clone() const
01115             {
01116                 return new hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>(*this);
01117             }
01118 
01119             /* Returns the coupling constant corresponding to the factorization
01120             scale: */
01121 
01122             value_type alpha_s() const
01123             {
01124 #if HAVE_LHAPDF_H_
01125                 return LHAPDF::alphasPDF(this->mu_F);
01126 #else
01127                 return value_type(-1);
01128 #endif
01129             }
01130 
01131             /* Serialisation: */
01132             /*----------------*/
01133 
01134             /* Returns the polymorphic type. */
01135 
01136             std::string type() const
01137             {
01138                 switch(hadron1)
01139                 {
01140                     case 2212:
01141                         if(hadron2==2212)
01142                         {
01143                             return "pp_y";
01144                         }
01145                         else if(hadron2==-2212)
01146                         {
01147                             return "ppbar_y";
01148                         }
01149                         else
01150                         {
01151                             return "X";
01152                         }
01153                         break;
01154                     case -2212:
01155                         if(hadron2==2212)
01156                         {
01157                             return "pbarp_y";
01158                         }
01159                         else if(hadron2==-2212)
01160                         {
01161                             return "pbarpbar_y";
01162                         }
01163                         else
01164                         {
01165                             return "X";
01166                         }
01167                         break;
01168                     default:
01169                         return "X";
01170                 }
01171             }
01172 
01174 
01175             std::ostream& print_settings(std::ostream& os) const
01176             {
01177                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"beam energy -1:"<<this->beam_energy(0)<<std::endl;
01178                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"hadron -1:"<<hadron1<<std::endl;
01179                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"beam energy -2:"<<this->beam_energy(0)<<std::endl;
01180                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"hadron -2:"<<hadron2<<std::endl;
01181                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"Ecm:"<<this->Ecm()<<std::endl;
01182                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"PDF set:"<<pdf_name()<<std::endl;
01183                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"PDF nr:"<<pdf_number()<<std::endl;
01184                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"mu_F:"<<this->mu_F<<std::endl;
01185                 os<<std::setw(30)<<std::left<<"alpha_s:"<<alpha_s()<<std::endl;
01186                 return os;
01187             }
01188 
01189             /* Derived loading method: */
01190 
01191             std::istream& load_data(std::istream& is)
01192             {
01193                 safe_read(is,tau_min);
01194                 safe_read(is,ymax);
01195                 safe_read(is,LHA_ymax);
01196                 if(y_gen!=NULL)
01197                 {
01198                     delete y_gen;
01199                 }
01200                 y_gen=s_generator<value_type,rng_t>::create_instance(&y,is,NULL,NULL,NULL);
01201                 return is;
01202             }
01203 
01204             /* Derived saving method: */
01205 
01206             std::ostream& save_data(std::ostream& os) const
01207             {
01208                 safe_write(os,tau_min);
01209                 os<<"\t";
01210                 safe_write(os,ymax);
01211                 os<<"\t";
01212                 safe_write(os,LHA_ymax);
01213                 os<<std::endl;
01214                 y_gen->save(os);
01215                 return os;
01216             }
01217 
01218         private:
01219             
01220             value_type y,tau,x1,x2,tau_min,LHA_ymax,ymax;
01221             s_generator<value_type,rng_t>* y_gen;
01222             bool flip;
01223     };
01224     template<class model_t,class rng_t>const typename hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::size_type hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::k0;
01225     template<class model_t,class rng_t>const typename hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::size_type hadronic_is_y<model_t,rng_t,Minkowski_type>::kL;
01226 }
